messages.message:
hey folks, is there a way to track LLM token usage by app/deployment/workspace/user? JPMC is setting this as a requirement for them so they can charge back LLM usage to the correct teams within their organization. they will be customer-hosted and using their own LLM endpoints, so they will be paying the LLM charges as well as AI Hub charges. we have this ticket (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2318) for metronome, but the scope does not include LLM token usage.
cc @tamir
Not 100% sure but I think we store the data but don’t have a way to surface it. @Victor Zeng can you confirm? Also, cc: @hannah
Hmm I don’t think that we should be providing this more broadly as customers should only see AI hub usage rates (our pricing model) - not token usage
I understand why JPMC might want this - but our usage page should reflect our pricing unit

is there something we could suggest to JPMC to track token usage against use-cases? Or perhaps a monthly report we could provide?
• Additionally, if this is something we already have visibility into (but not surfacing), could we do our own calculations as to what an average Unit converts to for LLM Tokens? I get that it may not be 1:1, but perhaps there's an average or rough estimate we could help them figure out

is there a different area in the platform we could surface this information that isn't tied to Metronome or connected to our usage rates? the customer will already see the aggregate token usage on their side, since they are using their own endpoints, but it will all be attributed to AI Hub. they are just asking for a way to break that down to be more granular from our platform. is there any kind of API call tagging or anything that we can do when calling LLMs to support this?
@Ed -- would the comment above help us here? :eyes:
